page.title: 11DARTMOUTH COMMUNITY COLLEGE
page.content:
Dartmouth School was designated a {Community College}in 1975.
The philosophy behind the Community College is to provide a{cradle to {grave}educational stimulus in terms of leisure and hobby activities, as well as{traditional}educational courses. This year{61}courses are available, from basic plumbing to advanced navigation. The most popular courses are Tai Chi and Wind Surfing. The College is also the central organisation in the area for the{Duke of{Edinburgh's Award Scheme}and it provides training for{Youth Leaders. Some interesting developments include {family}creative workshops which will encourage parents and children to learn together, holding playgroups on the premises and "Tea dancing" for the {elderly}but manned by pupils.
